level.name: Ship
level.signText: Hey there, you can use the W/D keys or the arrow keys to move and the space bar to jump. Looks like your ship is going down! Better get out of there!

level.name: Outside
level.npcText: Where am I? Wait a second... who am I?? I need to find help NOW!

level.name: More help
level.npcText: Hmm.. this place looks oddly familiar. I feel as if I keep moving I will get somewhere.

level.name: Look, a mansion!
level.npcText: Wow, this is an expensive looking mansion. I should see if anyone is home so I can get help.

level.name: Inside the mansion
level.signText: DEED This mansion belongs to Jim Johnston.
level.npcText: Wow, its dark in here, but I can still make my way around surprisingly well... It's as if I have been here before.

level.name: The machine
level.signText: This is the roof, be careful.
level.npcText: Oh my! What is this, I better run fast if I want to escape those blades.

level.name: On the roof
level.signText: Jump off the edge bud, trust me its worth it.
level.npcText: Why do I have the sudden urge to jump?

level.name: Falling down
level.signText: Flip that switch to turn on your military grade portal and get out of here.
level.npcText: Ouch!!! I must have been out for hours. Wait.. that's it IM JIM! THIS is MY house.

level.name: On a boat
level.npcText: Sir, you are back. I thought you were lost for good! The wars over son, you can go home now.

level.name: The END
level.signText: Congrats, you made it! Press M to return to menu...
